mapper.sql: drug_code, drug_name, costs, drug_units, amount, rpt_date, doctor_code, doctor_name, dept_code, dept_name, drug_spec, firm_id, charges, identity, charge_type, is_anti, patient_id, visit_id, drug_form, is_basedrug, ddd_value
mapper.select:
select t.drug_code, t.drug_name, t.drug_units, t.drug_spec, t.firm_id, t.drug_form， nvl(sum(t.costs),0) sumcosts, nvl(sum(t.amount),0) sumamount, nvl(sum(t.is_anti),0) anti, nvl(sum(t.is_basedrug),0) baseDrug from dr_drug_summary t where t.rpt_date >= to_date(#{pd.beginDate} ,'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.rpt_date <= to_date(#{pd.endDate} ,'yyyy-mm-dd')
and is_anti = 1
and is_basedrug = 1
and is_anti != 1
and t.drug_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.pd.drug_name}),'%')
group by t.drug_code, t.drug_name, t.drug_units, t.drug_spec, t.firm_id, t.drug_form order by ${pd.orderBy} desc

select * from (select b.*, row_number() over(partition by dept_code order by ${pd.orderBy} desc) rk from (select nvl(sum(t.costs),0) costs, nvl(sum(t.amount),0) amount, t.drug_units, t.drug_spec, t.drug_code, t.drug_name, firm_id, dept_code, dept_name from dr_drug_summary t where t.rpt_date >= to_date(#{pd.beginDate} ,'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.rpt_date <= to_date(#{pd.endDate} ,'yyyy-mm-dd')
and is_anti = 1
and is_basedrug = 1
and is_anti != 1
and t.drug_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.drug_name}),'%')
and t.dept_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.dept_name}),'%')
group by firm_id, t.dept_code, t.dept_name, t.drug_code, t.drug_name, t.drug_units, t.drug_spec order by ${pd.orderBy} desc ) b ) w where w.rk <= ${pd.ranking}

select * from (select b.*, row_number() over(partition by dept_code order by ${pd.orderBy} desc) rk from (select nvl(sum(t.costs),0) costs, nvl(sum(t.amount),0) amount, t.drug_units, t.drug_spec, t.drug_code, t.drug_name, t.firm_id, t.doctor_name, t.dept_name, t.dept_code from ias.dr_drug_summary t where t.rpt_date >= to_date(#{pd.beginDate} ,'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.rpt_date <= to_date(#{pd.endDate} ,'yyyy-mm-dd')
and is_anti = 1
and is_basedrug = 1
and is_anti != 1
and t.drug_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.drug_name}),'%')
and t.dept_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.dept_name}),'%')
and t.doctor_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.doctor_name}),'%')
group by firm_id, t.drug_code, t.drug_name, t.drug_units, t.drug_spec, t.doctor_name, t.dept_code, t.dept_name order by ${pd.orderBy} desc) b) w where w.rk <= ${pd.ranking}

select nvl(sum(t.costs),0) costs, t.doctor_name, t.dept_name from dr_drug_summary t where t.rpt_date >= to_date(#{pd.beginDate} ,'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.rpt_date <= to_date(#{pd.endDate} ,'yyyy-mm-dd')
and t.is_anti = 1
and t.is_basedrug = 1
and is_anti != 1
and t.dept_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.dept_name}),'%')
and t.doctor_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.doctor_name}),'%')
group by t.doctor_name, t.dept_name order by costs desc

select nvl(sum(t.costs),0) costs, nvl(sum(t.amount),0) amount, t.drug_code, t.drug_name, t.drug_spec, t.doctor_name, t.dept_name, t.drug_units from dr_drug_summary t where t.rpt_date >= to_date(#{pd.beginDate} ,'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.rpt_date <= to_date(#{pd.endDate} ,'yyyy-mm-dd')
and t.is_anti = 1
and t.is_basedrug = 1
and t.is_anti != 1
and t.drug_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.drug_name}),'%')
and t.dept_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.dept_name}),'%')
and t.doctor_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.doctor_name}),'%')
group by t.drug_code,t.drug_name, t.doctor_name, t.drug_spec, drug_units, t.dept_name order by ${pd.orderBy} desc

select t.drug_code, t.drug_name, t.drug_units, t.drug_spec, t.firm_id, t.rpt_date, nvl(sum(t.costs),0) costs, nvl(sum(t.amount),0) amount from dr_drug_summary t where t.rpt_date >= to_date(#{pd.beginDate} ,'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.rpt_date <= to_date(#{pd.endDate} ,'yyyy-mm-dd')
and t.is_anti = 1
and t.is_basedrug = 1
and t.is_anti != 1
and t.drug_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.drug_name}),'%')
and t.dept_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.dept_name}),'%')
and t.doctor_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.doctor_name}),'%')
group by t.drug_code,t.drug_name, t.drug_units, t.drug_spec, t.firm_id, t.rpt_date order by ${pd.orderBy} desc
